classes.name: Dog
classes.code: export class Dog {constructor(public name: string){console.log('hello world');}public bark(message: string): void {console.log(`${this.name} is barking ${message}`);} }

classes.name: Cat
classes.code: export class Cat {constructor(public name: string){ console.log('hello world');}public meow(message: string): void {console.log(`${this.name} is meowing ${message}`);} }
